1.0.name: wordpress/refolio
1.0.description: reFolio is a plugin portfolio providing elegant portfolios anywhere on your wordpress site! Define an unlimited number of portfolios which can be used anywhere on your wordpress site that shortcodes are supported. Easy to use and 100% wordpress integrated means a quick snappy portfolio that lets your work shine.
